name: J.A.C.K.
description: Brand new level editor for games with a Quake-style BSP architecture; a convenient cross-platform tool capable of incorporating the best features of existing editors, such as Valve Hammer Editor, Q3Radiant, and others. J.A.C.K. does aspire to be the universal level design tool for classic games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer Processor: CPU 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb video card Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer Processor: CPU 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb video card Storage: 50 MB available space
